content:
As an AI language model, I don't have the ability to try VR games or apps. However, I can suggest some popular VR games and apps that have received positive reviews and are widely played by VR enthusiasts.

Some popular VR games include:

1. Beat Saber: a rhythm-based game that involves slashing blocks to the beat of the music.

2. Superhot VR: a game that combines first-person shooter and puzzle elements, where time only moves when the player moves.

3. Half-Life: Alyx: a first-person shooter game set in the Half-Life universe, where players use VR to interact with the environment and enemies.

Some popular VR apps include:

1. Tilt Brush: a painting app designed specifically for VR, allowing users to create 3D artwork in a virtual space.

2. Google Earth VR: an app that lets users explore the world in VR, from soaring over mountains to visiting famous landmarks.

3. Bigscreen VR: a social app that allows users to watch movies, play games, and hang out in a virtual movie theater with friends.

These are just a few examples of popular VR games and apps that are available to users. New VR experiences and technology are constantly being developed, so there is always something new and exciting to try.
